text: Voistinu, dlya musul'man i musul'manok, veruyushchikh muzhchin i veruyushchikh zhenshchin, pokornykh muzhchin i pokornykh zhenshchin, pravdivykh muzhchin i pravdivykh zhenshchin, terpelivykh muzhchin i terpelivykh zhenshchin, smirennykh muzhchin i smirennykh zhenshchin, podayushchikh milostynyu muzhchin i podayushchikh milostynyu zhenshchin, postyashchikhsya muzhchin i postyashchikhsya zhenshchin, khranyashchikh tselomudriye muzhchin i khranyashchikh tselomudriye zhenshchin i chasto pominayushchikh Allakha muzhchin i zhenshchin, Allakh ugotovil proshcheniye i velikuyu nagradu
